code: import React,{useMemo,useState}from'react';import{useAuth}from'../../context/AuthContext';import{getBackendInfo}from'../../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function DevAdminLogin(){const{login}=useAuth();const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const show=useMemo(()=>{const info=getBackendInfo();const isDev=process.env.NODE_ENV!=='production';return isDev&&info.isLocal;},[]);if(!show)return null;const handleClick=async()=>{setError(null);setLoading(true);try{await login('admin@chrononinja.app','admin123');}catch(e){setError('Не удалось войти админом');}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'grid',gap:6},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleClick,disabled:loading,children:loading?'Входим как админ...':'Войти как админ (локально)'}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{color:'red',fontSize:12},children:error})]});}
